title: Version 3.4:
message:
Version 3.4:
UI:
* improved format of list entries
* instead of floating the menu buttons to open files, urls, ... are now embedded in the entries
Code:
* made code more modular for better reusability adding BaseBibtexEntry.java
* functionality moved from the Activity to the Adapter as well as from the adapter to the entry class
* added code to get numerical months to prepare sorting
* context can no longer be leaked through the adapter as it can now be constructed without giving a context

title: made three async tasks annonymous inner classes so that they acrry an explicite…
message: made three async tasks annonymous inner classes so that they acrry an explicite reference to the activity
